What is Financial Freedom?
Financial Freedom is equal to having enough resources to achieve ones financial goals, having all your risks covered and also being prepared for any type of contingency or life event. This is the time on one is free from financial stress & is experiencing peace of mind.
Based on your answers, you have scored {!Lead.Ffreedom_Score__c} compared to the ideal Ffreedom Score of 100 which is an indicator of complete Financial Freedom.
You will shortly be receiving (email) a personalized & detailed analysis of your Ffreedom Score.
